name: ai-stack-fastapi
description: Production-grade FastAPI boilerplate for AI applications with RAG, vector databases, and zero vendor lock-in
author: AI Stack Team

scripts.backend:dev: cd apps/backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/backend && uv run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:revision: cd apps/backend && uv run alembic revision --autogenerate -m
scripts.db:downgrade: cd apps/backend && uv run alembic downgrade -1
